Package org.jconfigurations.functions

Contains functions used by the framework, most of which implement the custom ErrorFunction.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectionFieldConverterFunction
    The CollectionFieldConverterFunction is analogous to the FieldConverterFunction: it analyzes the field's CollectionConfiguration.converter() value to produce an instance of a suitable CollectionConfigurationConverter.
    DefaultCollectionTypeConverterFunction
    Special function used by the framework to produce an instance of a suitable CollectionConfigurationConverter for any given type.
    If none are found then the NoCollectionConfigurationConverter is returned.
    The following type-converter mappings are provided: List - ListConfigurationConverter Set - SetConfigurationConverter
    DefaultFieldNameFunction
    Function that extracts a field's name from either: its @Name value, or its name as declared in the source code Using this function with a field whose name is empty will result in a ConfigurationException.
    DefaultMapTypeConverterFunction
    Special function used by the framework to produce an instance of a suitable MapConfigurationConverter for any given type.
    If none are found then the NoMapConfigurationConverter is returned.
    The following type-converter mappings are provided: Map - HashMapConfigurationConverter HashMap - HashMapConfigurationConverter
    DefaultTypeConverterFunction
    Special function used by the framework to produce an instance of a suitable ConfigurationConverter for any given type.
    If none are found then the NoConfigurationConverter is returned.
    The following type-converter mappings are provided: float -> FloatConfigurationConverter int -> IntegerConfigurationConverter String -> StringConfigurationConverter double -> DoubleConfigurationConverter long -> LongConfigurationConverter boolean -> BooleanConfigurationConverter BigDecimal -> BigDecimalConfigurationConverter BigInteger -> BigIntegerConfigurationConverter File -> FileConfigurationConverter URL -> URLConfigurationConverter
    FieldConverterFunction
    Function that produces a suitable ConfigurationConverter for a given field by analyzing the field's Configuration.converter() value.
    MapFieldConverterFunction
    The MapFieldConverterFunction is analogous to the FieldConverterFunction: it analyzes the field's MapConfiguration.converter() value to produce an instance of a suitable MapConfigurationConverter.

Package org.jconfigurations.functions Description

 Contains functions used by the framework, most of which implement the custom ErrorFunction.
